name: MindfulStates-factsaboutUSstates
0:
”Alexa ask Mindful States for the capital of Iowa”
”Alexa ask Mindful States what was the 8th state to become a state”
”Alexa ask Mindful States what do you call people who live in kentucky”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: mindful states
des:
Created by a father and daughter team, this skill is a great way to learn and practice a variety of facts about US states. We started with the states and capitals to help her study for her 4th grade states & capitals quiz, and it was so much fun that we kept adding more facts!! She did all of the research, and she even wrote most of the code. We hope you have as much fun using it as we did creating it!

Here are the types of facts you can ask about:
State Capital
State Flower
State Motto
State Bird
State Grass
State Rose
State Rock
State Nickname
State Abbreviation
Coordinates
Timezone
Latitude
Longitude
Region
Population
Governor
Lt. Governor
What do you call someone from the state
Date the state joined the union
Order in which the state was admitted
Territory the state originally belonged to
What is next to the state
--You can even say "I'd like a random state fact" and see what Alexa offers up!

Provided by Mindful Gaming, Inc. (c) 2017
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
